channel.title: Need interface help
channel.description: Ok i wanted to add a command that gives donator i copy and pasted my info thing and change the name but it still wont work. and the interface code thing is the same for the others any ideas? Also can any give me some pest control help? please and thank you

item.title: Need interface help
item.dc:creator: @Sage_Mode Sage Mode
item.description:
@Sage_Mode wrote:

What help do you need with pest control, you need to explain that question. I kind of understood the donator command question so…

else if (cmd[0].equals("givedonator") && p.username.equals("NAME HERE")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just given donator to " + p2.username + "."); p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "Exile has just given you donator! You can now go to the donator zone!"); p2.donator = 1;

Erm… also this for 508s. Hopefully you were not talking about a 317…

Read full topic
